reuters.title: FNMA SETS 8.55 PCT, 9.20 PCT COUPONS ON 1.5 BILLION DEBT OFFER
reuters.body: K-Tron International Inc said its board elected John C. Tucker president, filling a position that had been vacant since July 30, 1985. Tucker joined K-Tron in 1981 as vice president, chief financial officer and treasurer. In 1986 he was promoted to executive vice president and chief operating officer. Reuter 
